ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer

cookingTips: Use beer at room temperature for even mixing; carbonation helps create tender crumb
Don't overmix batter; stir just until combined for lighter bread texture
Bake at 375°F for 45-50 minutes until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook in creating a quick, simple bread using beer's carbonation and flavor for no-knead convenience.
